titles: All the submyssyons, and recantations of Thomas Cranmer, late Archebyshop of Canterburye truely set forth both in Latyn and Englysh, agreable to the originalles, wrytten and subscribed with his owne hande. Visum [et] examinatum per reuerendum patrem [et] dominum, dominum edmundum episcopum London. Anno, M.D.LVI.
author: Cranmer, Thomas, 1489-1556.
publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi Typographi Regiæ Maiestatis],
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Church of England --  History --  Early works to 1800.
